lenders.name: Julian
lenders.loan_because: its a brilliant way to help people
lenders.occupational_info: Managing, organizing and administrating all the services and features Galaxy-News (our company) provides and supporting the community by answering questions etc.

lenders.name: Danny Kent
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people, and I know how hard it is to start a business!
lenders.occupational_info: Developing systems to fit people's needs and improve efficiency!

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I am so lucky in my life and I want to share some of my good fortune.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am an emerging artist. I use oil paints to create pictures of everyday life. My favorite subjects are exteriors and interiors, still lifes and portraits. I'm also a photographer and have been taking pictures since I was in my early teens. 

My favorite pastimes are listening to classical music, traveling and spending time with my husband, our kids, my brothers and their families and with friends. 

Before I retired, I worked at Whatcom Community College helping students learn the skills they needed to succeed. I was the Coordinator of the Learning Center where students received tutoring and had computers to use for their classes. We specialized in students who were studying English as a Second Language and returning adult students.

lenders.name: Vonda
lenders.occupation: Chief Child Manager in our household

lenders.name: Dawn in San Diego
lenders.loan_because: I want to live life generously.  I want to help hard working people realize their dreams and make people's lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide health services to employees of the postal office in the USA.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: KIVA satisfies the giving desires of my heart and my head.
lenders.occupational_info: health care

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: We (Americans) have been given so many opportunities and I want to make sure the money is going to someone who is being proactive, such as these entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I make a decent living because I know more about a single subject than most people.

lenders.name: anthony
lenders.loan_because: helping others is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Edith
lenders.loan_because: If you can help someone live better and if they are willing to help themself. I do not have much, but I can spare a little. To put a smile on someones face.
lenders.occupational_info: I instruct interactive girls/women parties. The hostess and her guests, learn a veil dance routine. I supply the music, veils, hip scarfs for each person to wear during the party. I come to party in full gypsy/belly dance costume. Some parties the quests dress in costume. Other parties they wear jeans and tee shirts. I enjoy my job and everyone has a great time.

lenders.name: gary
lenders.loan_because: help other people

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate to have people who cared when I needed help, and I'm a firm believer in 'pay it forward'.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the accounts payable department of a small company.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: Among others, I received a Kiva Gift Certificate for Christmas...by far, the most satisfying to spend!! Viva Kiva! My world has just opened...

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: I have been given so much. I hope to do the same for somebody else.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend my days with my amazing daughter.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: to those who much is given, much is expected...
lenders.occupational_info: defending the poor, the downtrodden, and those without a voice.

lenders.name: CESÃO
lenders.occupation: Analista de Sistemas  na área de Telecomunicações

lenders.name: Polly
lenders.loan_because:
If I can help one person at a time,
I can help change the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
I relieve pain and stress by gentle
intentional touch.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: the right  thing to do

lenders.name: JT
lenders.loan_because: I like the concept of micro-finance, and how these loans can improve lives.
lenders.occupational_info: student

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Micro-credit can help those in developing nations raise themselves up to a better quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: My research is in computer memory: I design techniques to enable faster, less expensive microprocessors.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do - it gets the funding directly to the real people who need it most to grow their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a large group of people to build machines that test people's blood for various problems.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because I can.
I loan because it's good to help others.
I loan because hope demands action.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find a good place to live and, if the time comes that they want or need to move to another place, I help find a new person or family to take that home for their own.  I take care of people and their housing needs.

lenders.name: Mollie & Dave
lenders.loan_because: this is a great way to promote social justice.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I am so aware of how very, very lucky I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked with people & books( but now I'm retired.)

lenders.name: Katherine and Mike
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Working with plants, trees, roots for medicine. Growing native indigenous healing plants and food..

lenders.name: Carolina
lenders.loan_because: it costs me nothing and it's a way to help people get on their own feet by their own means.

lenders.name: Lorna & Critters
lenders.loan_because: A better community for individuals and their families means a better society for all of us.  Lending through KIVA  is just one small step toward leveling the playing field of life. It is one which I am privileged to take and I hope others will join me on this human journey. Lending also makes me feel good about myself because anything that helps to level the playing field is the right thing to do!
lenders.occupational_info: As a student, I am still learning. I attend lectures, write papers and I read a lot. I enjoy what I do and I am fortunate to be able to pursue my dream. Everyone should have the same chance. My critters are Magic (canine), Star (feline), Joker (feline) & Diva (feline). The kittens were all feral & littermates, born in my back yard and later adopted, by Magic & I.

lenders.name: The Burnett Family
lenders.loan_because: We would like to help make a difference in the lives of hard working people all across the world who were not blessed with the opportunity we have in the U.S. Everyone deserves a chance at achieving their dreams!

lenders.name: Evelien
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: I am a fulltime student of English at the University of Amsterdam

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I have lots to be thankful for.
lenders.occupational_info: I am helping my husband build our retirement home.

lenders.name: John and Wendy
lenders.loan_because: Our lives are so blessed with riches.  We have not had to struggle in the ways that many others have done –and are still doing. It is time we supported the best principles of Kiva
lenders.occupational_info: Retired wildlife film maker : International flight attendant

lenders.name: Riley
lenders.loan_because: There are many people who are less fortunate that I would like to help. I feel like I should be doing this more often.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student and first got the idea of this from my soccer coach.

lenders.name: Roberta
lenders.loan_because: I'm able to and want to - it's a wonderful way to help someone who works hard and it's very interesting and rewarding to read about the vision and spirit of others. How can we not when some of us have so much.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: There has been a lot of positive press for Kiva and Kiva allows me to help someone very directly
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired now but I used to work for a high-tech company in Silicon Valley.

lenders.name: Clare
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.Having lived in 9 Countries, including Ghana and Indonesia, this is the perfect way to help the people who have helped us feel at home in their country.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I want to  help people around the world. Everybody deserves a chance to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in 6th grade. I am also involved with the local Girl Scouts.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a chance to make the most out of their lives, and I believe in the goodness of humanity.
lenders.occupational_info: I answer questions about everything and help people find information.

lenders.name: Kaysha
lenders.loan_because: I loan because there are things, like Kiva, which are greater than myself and are helping the greater good.

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the life of people around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that coordinates health care for poor people.

lenders.name: Leo Wong
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others realize their potential.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and research how business practice can become more socially responsible and educate business students and practitioners in this field.

lenders.name: Wes & Allison
lenders.loan_because: I care!

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: If there's any way I can play a small role in helping someone else achieve their goals, I feel it's my responsibility to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an advertising agency that specializes in recruitment. We work with companies across multiple industry sectors to fill open positions they have.

lenders.name: Yoko
lenders.occupation: High School Counselor, Small Business Owner

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I am excited about the opportunity to help people who are working hard to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a teacher for 33 years.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: It is the least I can do and some day soon I will do the most I can do.

lenders.name: Lawrence
lenders.loan_because:
Guided by a basic creed shared by Warren Buffett and the Gates Foundation, "every life has equal value".  

Unfortunately circumstances in the community and society structures restricts people's opportunities, which everybody deserves to have.  That is six billion people who've got much poorer hands in life than we have.  Access to capital should never be restricted.  

For the finance literate audience, the return on capital should not be define by only dollars and cents.  A number cannot capture the intangible, utility factor of lives being changed, which as a consequence, roots for a harmonious community in the future.  Let's do our best to plant many seeds so others can follow and give to others and make our world a far better place.  

PS. Eric, you'll always be in our hearts.
http://www.kiva.org/lender/soeric

lenders.name: lauren
lenders.loan_because: We're given a lot in the USA. It's time for us to give back more than we take out.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company called PSYOP (www.psyop.tv). We create commercials, but they're not ugly, they're actually really beautiful.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: you can't take it with you

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I love visiting developing countries but feel I've got to give back something in return
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently retired but I do volunteer work in the educational field

lenders.name: Oliver
lenders.loan_because: Helping others help themselves is a real pleasure.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping my company transition to SAP. SAP is a software system used to manage all aspects of a business. My specialty is repair of airplane equipment.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: $25 can go a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the IT world.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping others around the world get a good start.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a financial analyst and a mom to 2 small children.

lenders.occupational_info: Registered Nurse

lenders.name: Dean
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I own homes and apartments, which I lease to tenants.

lenders.loan_because: instead of receiving gifts for birthdays etc we have decided this a far better way to give gifts. Our children love it...

It's a honor to help, in such  a small way, those who are not afraid of hard work and brave enough to bring change into their lives. 

It's pretty random when it comes to choosing loans but I confess to having a soft spot for agriculture and food sectors due to my own family history.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a small medical office where I am blessed with co workers and patients who treat me like family.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a part owner of a small environmental consulting firm specializing in wetland restoration, wildlife habitat assessment, and endangered plant and wildlife surveys.

lenders.name: David

lenders.name: David

lenders.occupational_info: Professional businessman with a happy family.

lenders.name: Petra

lenders.occupational_info: my work as a contractor for small air-conditioning works is very challenging and i like it very much because i learn to deal with people from every walks of society.

lenders.name: Tai
lenders.occupational_info: Travel addict and adventurer in my free time, risk management consultant during working hours. Drop me a line and I will tell you more!

lenders.name: Sendes

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: Everybody needs a chance in life.

lenders.loan_because: I love to help people who are determined to improve their lives and I want to do a small part to make their dreams a reality.

lenders.name: Sally

lenders.name: Suzanna

lenders.name: Andre
lenders.loan_because:
As an entrepreneur, I want to help other entrepreneurs.  I have been through challenging times before, so now it's time to give back and help others.  

Kiva makes so much sense because:
- we help those who are in need,
- we can make a big difference,
- there's very high Return on Input (my own take on the Return on Investment concept - we put in a little, they benefit so much - we get a really big bang for our buck!),
- we create and add value to others,
- this is relatively low risk (low default risk)

I've been looking to become a venture capitalist / angel investor so Kiva offers me a great launching pad! :)
lenders.occupational_info:
- Marketing and management consulting,
- Consulting in Corporate Social Responsibility / Green Marketing,
- Development of business proposals and business plans,
- Copywriting,
- Internet marketing,
- Target marketing / Lead Generation services

I know the market, I know of the real necessities of the advertisers and the purchasers. I studied well this project very therefore ja I have it in mind ja make some years.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone who has a dream, and energy to make the dream come true deserves a fair chance.

lenders.name: Ronan
lenders.loan_because:
I truly believe in the free market system and want to assist small business owners around the world.  After reading Muhammad Yunus' book "Banker to the Poor", I wanted to find out for myself how the concept of microfinance works.

I am excited that 8 MFIs from the Philippines are currently partnered with Kiva.  As a result, the majority of my new loans will focus on that area.  I will continue to diversify my lending portfolio with short-term loans from other parts of the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
I assist companies with implementing technological solutions that enable them to operate more efficiently.

In addition to being a KIVA lender, I also sponsor a child through Compassion International.  

I am grateful that I have the opportunity to make a small impression on the lives of others and help them out of the devastation of poverty.

About Compassion International:
Compassion International exists as a Christian child advocacy ministry that releases children from spiritual, economic, social and physical poverty and enables them to become responsible, fulfilled Christian adults.

Founded by the Rev. Everett Swanson in 1952, Compassion began providing Korean War orphans with food, shelter, education and health care, as well as Christian training. 

Today, Compassion helps more than 1 million children in 24 countries.

Visit the Compassion website:
www.compassion.com

lenders.name: Janna

lenders.occupational_info: I work with clients in pain to help them recover.

lenders.occupational_info: As the tribal historian of the Chickasaw Nation, an American Indian tribe headquartered in Oklahoma, I research and write articles and books aboout the tribe's history and culture.

lenders.name: Hans
lenders.loan_because: After reading Dr  Yunus' book on microfinance, I became a believer in the concept, but never found a way to become practically involved. Now with Kiva, everybody can become a microlender!
lenders.occupational_info: Working as a business manager in a non-profit association, part of my activities on the job, and outside office hours could be classified under the emerging discipline of social entrepreneurship.

lenders.loan_because: I find microfinance to be the most effective way to defeat poverty by strengthening the poor countries from within.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in my senior high school year and I am using Kiva to demonstrate how microfinance works as a part of my final high school project work about microeconomics.
